name: AmirAli Jahromi
comment: I've used grabpay but i haven't recieved any promocode! why?

name: Grab
comment: Hi AmirAli. If you have successfully completed at least ONE ride on GrabPay (credit/debit card) between 10th April – 30th April 2017, you will be contacted by Grab within the first 5 working days of each month in May, June and July to inform you about the promo code that you will be entitled for. For more information, kindly visit https://www.grab.com/my/blog/grabpayapril/ . Thank you :)
